name: My Little Galaxy
description:
2D space shooter with loots, ship upgrades, stations and more. 

The main purpose of this project is to learn and improve skills on Unity and game dev in general.

Most art is coming from free/cheap assets . See credits below

Hope you enjoy it!
Please leave a comment below.

Credits:

2D graphics/UI:
Skorpio http://opengameart.org/users/skorpio 
MillionthVector  http://millionthvector.blogspot.de 
Wenrexa https://wenrexa.itch.io/
CraftPix.net 2D Game Assets
Rawdanitsu https://opengameart.org/users/rawdanitsu

Music:
Main theme: Lost Signal by PetterTheSturgeon
Intro theme: Up In The Sky by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio

Game design / code:
Rogal68
